component.name: getFileInformation
component.description: Used to retrieve the metadata about a file.

component.name: updateFileInformation
component.description: Used to update individual or multiple fields in the file object, including renaming the file, changing it's description, and creating a shared link for the file.

component.name: downloadFile
component.description: Retrieves the actual data of the file.

component.name: uploadFile
component.description: Use the Uploads API to allow users to add a new file. The user can then upload a file by specifying the destination folder for the file.

component.name: deleteFile
component.description: Discards a file to the trash.

component.name: copyFile
component.description: Used to create a copy of a file in another folder.

component.name: shareFile
component.description: Used to create a shared link for this particular file.

component.name: listFileComments
component.description: Retrieves the comments on a particular file, if any exist.
